data.title: Test Engineer Resume Albuquerque, NM
meta_keywords: for designing and troubleshooting electronic circuits
data.meta_description: Seeking position in field of software design and testingMicrosoft Visual Studio 2008/2010, Eclipse SDK for Java and Android phone development, Java Net Beans, jMonkey Engine SDK, Windows Performance Profiler, Windows Process Explorer, Linux kernel modification and debugging.Designed with Visual studio 2008/2010 C++ and Steinberg technology, an analog pitch to midi converter VST that triggers a midi events. Created a analog to midi Guitar Synthesizer using Virtual Studio Technology
data.text:
SUMMARY:

Seeking position in field of software design and testing

Microsoft Visual Studio 2008/2010, Eclipse SDK for Java and Android phone development, Java Net Beans, jMonkey Engine SDK, Windows Performance Profiler, Windows Process Explorer, Linux kernel modification and debugging.

Designed with Visual studio 2008/2010 C++ and Steinberg technology, an analog pitch to midi converter VST that triggers a midi events. Created a analog to midi Guitar Synthesizer using Virtual Studio Technology

Designed and built signal conditioning interface to RS232 - C interface with Schmitt Triggers for transient noise elimination of mechanical to computer based data acquisition interface

Designed and built Finite Input Response Filter with Xilinx 10.1 XPS/ISE tools and VHDL to simulated, implemented and verified on the XC3S500 FPGA

Programmed the Blackfin533 microprocessor with Visual DSP++ Analog Devices software to translate and implement Matlab algorithms for controlling a military satellite space based application

Design and implemented C++ and VHDL applications running and implemented on Linux 2.6 operating system running on the Xsc500 FPGA

Programming Xilinx Spartan 3A/3E development boards with C++, Verilog and VHDL, Digital/Analog signal conditioning circuits, RISC microprocessors, ADC/DAC converter design, Embedded design of control logic with VHDL, Programming stepper motors with C, CMOS/FET/BJT analog circuit design, Finite Input Response filter design with VHDL, Small and Large signal amplifier design

TECHNICAL SKILLS:

Programming Languages: Standard ANSI C, Object Oriented C++/C#, Open Mp standard 3.0, Object Oriented Jscript/C#/C++/PHP, Objective C, Intel C++ Composer XE/Visual Studio 2010, mySQL, Java JDK 7 API, XML, XHTML, CSS, VB, Microsoft .Net Framework 4.5, ASP.NET MVC, VHDL/Verilog, Website development with HTML 5, Apache Server

Protocols: PCM, TCP/IP, UDP, MPICH, USB, CDMA, 1553B, SPI

Reliability Software: Lamda Predict

WEB Design Tools: Dreamweaver 8.0 for CSS/HTML/FLASH development

CAD Autodesk Programs: 3DS max 2010, Maya 2010, Autocad 2010

Graphics Platforms: OpenGL, DirectX, XNA

Operating Systems: Windows 8/7/XP, Unix/Linux

Bus Architectures: VME, SPI, USB, RS232/RS485

UML: IBM Rational Architect

Source Version Control: SVN

Laboratory Equipment: Logic analyzers, Digital storage oscilloscopes, Digital voltmeters, Frequency generators, for designing and troubleshooting electronic circuits

Hardware Design Languages: Motorola Mcore/Z80 assembly, Intel 8031/8051 assembly, Verilog/VHDL, Matlab/Simulink

Hardware Design IDE's: Xilinx Platform Studio SDK/ISE 10.1, Modelsim 5.8, Orcad Pspice, Analog Devices Visual DSP++, Altium Designer 6.0, Eagle 6.0, Microcap 8.0, LabWindows CVI 9.0, Labview 8.5

EXPERIENCE:

Confidential, Albuquerque, NM

Test Engineer

Responsibilities:

Programmed with LabView 2012 and created modules to interface with rack mount equipment on EADS test station for F15 upgrades and data acquisition.

Ran LabView Teststand scripts for acceptance tests.

Confidential, Albuquerque, NM

Software programmer

Responsibilities:

Designed and Programmed an Object Oriented C# interface for 3D software simulations of Oil Rig industrial equipment using Visual Studio.NET: VB, C#, 3DS MAX 2010, and XNA Game Studio 3.1

Interfaced 3D graphics to data acquisition hardware to emulate actual Confidential control equipment for 3D simulation of total oil rig floor equipment.

Worked with Terragen 2.0 for landscape creation of nature background scenes.

Programmed the Xilinx XSC500 FPGA with C++, VHDL and Verilog with custom logic placed the uCLinux OS on the XSC500 FPGA and programmed user applications such as ADC/DAC converters, FIR filters, and single chip computer all on one FGPA.

Worked on Analog Guitar to MIDI interface with Visual Studio 2008 and C# using pitch detection algorithms.

Wrote high speed device drivers with C++ for analog to MIDI guitar interface.

Confidential, Albuquerque, NM

Temporary Software programmer

Responsibilities:

Modified LabView 6.0 GUI Data Acquisition Software for scanning Monochromator and modified C++ DLL interfacing with LabView for Confidential

Confidential, Albuquerque, NM

Electrical Engineer

Responsibilities:

Developed data acquisition test software with Lab Windows CVI 9.0 interfacing GPIB and VISA drivers for communication with various laboratory equipment

Agilent and Sorensen power supplies, Tektronix DP03032 two channel oscilloscope, ASCOR 64 channel 1 amp relay matrix and Condor 1553 two channel PCI card

Used Lambda Predict MIL SPEC 217F software for reliability circuit analysis of data acquisition circuit boards for the C130J Bus Interface Data Acquisition Unit

Updated Lockheed Martin traceability for C130J customer specifications for Bus Interface Unit functionality using MIL SPEC 217F

Designed analog/digital tachometer circuit for C130J Bus Interface Unit with Microcap 8.0 electronics circuit simulator

Confidential, Albuquerque, NM

Embedded Software Engineer and Electronics Design Engineer

Responsibilities:

Wrote Device Drivers running on QNX RTOS for data acquisition for black box recorder on AV8B Harrier Jet.

Designed and built flame detector circuit detecting jet engine fuel fires using various photodiode sensors and operational amplifiers

Designed discrete I/O switch panel and simulated with Altium designer 6 for data acquisition test station

Setup boot configuration to download Linux 4.5 image to LPC3180 microprocessor running user specific applications for black box recorder

Wrote programs using Python 2.6 for data acquisition I/O test station interface to national instruments serial cards

Wrote driver code in C for ARM 9 LPC3180 processor for testing a programmable gain amplifier multiplexer board

Using Xilinx 10.1 ISE VHDL, developed RS232 Serial to 1553 interface on FPGA for hardware to test station interface

Confidential, Albuquerque, NM

Embedded Software Engineer

Responsibilities:

Maintained and modified an existing C application for the Blackfin 533 microprocessor using Analog Devices Visual DSP++ C language package to detect point light sources.

Debugged C application with JTAG CABLE for camera hardware and software.

Interfaced C Application to peripherals using SPI, and RS232 and LCD with blacksheep board support package.

Translated Matlab Optical algorithms for image enhancement to ANSI C and integrated to Blackfin 533 processor using Visual DSP++ IDE from Analog Devices.

Worked for a local hospital maintaining computer printer operation

Worked for local insurance company maintaining a computer network running Novell and maintained computer printers

Confidential, Albuquerque, NM

Software Engineering Intern

Responsibilities:

Troubleshot data acquisition boards for drone helicopters with windows based Logic Analyzer and ran acceptance tests

Tested Visual Basic flight software for errors

Programmed robotic flexible link using TMS - 320-DSP using Lab Windows CVI

Wrote GUI for Neural Network control of inverted pendulum using Lab windows CVI

Wrote application with Visual Studio C++ 6.0 using Microsoft Foundation Classes interfacing external sensors to Fuzzy Logic Abstract Data Type, thereby automating a small scale desalination plant

Built and designed digital and analog signal conditioning circuits thereby interfacing a PC to external temperature and pressure sensors for desalination hardware

Wrote programs with Lab windows CVI 4.5 and LabView 7.1 for testing data acquisition boards for desalination plant project

Confidential

Applications Programmer

Responsibilities:
